DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-arm , multicentre , prospective dose-finding trial safety efficacy atacicept subject active rheumatoid arthritis fail three month therapeutic trial tumor necrosis factor alpha ( TNFa ) antagonist due lack efficacy .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Dose-finding Study Atacicept Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis ( AUGUST I )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) satisfy American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) diagnostic criterion disease history least one year 2 . Male female great equal ( > = ) 18years age time inform consent 3 . Active RA define : > =8 swollen joint ( 66joint count ) , > =8 tender joint ( 68joint count ) , Creactive protein ( CRP ) > =10 milligram per liter ( mg/L ) ( central laboratory ) and/or erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR ) > = 28 millimeter per hour ( mm/h ) 4 . Failure least one TNFa antagonist therapy ( previously time screen ) specify protocol 5 . Other protocol define inclusion criterion could apply 1 . Any condition , include laboratory finding finding medical history pretrial assessment , opinion Investigator constitute risk contraindication subject 's participation trial could interfere trial objective , conduct evaluation 2 . Treatment biologics aim B cell modulation rituximab belimumab within 2 year study Day 1 3 . Any previous treatment anakinra ( Kineret ) , abatacept ( Orencia ) tocilizumab within 3 month study Day 1 4 . Use etanercept ( Enbrel ) within 28 day study Day 1 , infliximab ( Remicade ) adalimumab ( Humira ) within 60 day study Day 1 5 . Participation interventional clinical trial unapproved investigational therapy within 3 month start study ( within 5 halflives investigate compound study Day 1 , whichever long ) 6 . Other protocol define exclusion criterion could apply
